message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your budget constraints, but $90 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but $105 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $95.
